author: IGN
description:
From the developer of the visually stunning games Abzu, Journey, and The Pathless comes a sword-surfing adventure with sick tricks and fast, fluid traversal. Creative director Matt Nava joins us at IGN Live to talk all about Sword of the Sea and how the team at Giant Squid are evolving its artistic vision with innovative gameplay that combines extreme sports and action-adventure. Sword of the Sea is set to launch on August 19, 2025 for PC and PS5.

IGN's Summer of Gaming is presented by Nintendo Switch 2. All Together, Anytime, Anywhere.

#IGN #Gaming #IGNLive2025
title: Tony Hawk Meets Journey in the Surreal Adventure Sword of the Sea | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
Blind Descent invites players into a mesmerizing yet unforgiving world buried deep beneath the Martian surface. After a catastrophic mission failure, a lone survivor awakens in a vast, alien ecosystem. What begins as a desperate search for missing crew members evolves into a journey of symbiosis with a world that resists, adapts, and remembers.

Blind Descent is set to launch via Early Access on Steam in 2026. The game is also coming to Xbox Series S & PlayStation 5.

#IGN
title: Blind Descent - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
It's official: Resident Evil 9 is coming, and we just got our first real look at it during Summer Game Fest 2025.

Resident Evil Requiem is a single-player survival horror game due out February 27, 2026 across PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X and S.
Plus, The Star Wars: Starfighter cast is beginning to take shape. All that and more in today’s Daily Fix!

#IGN #Gaming #IGNLive2025
title: Resident Evil 9 Officially Revealed - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Showrunner and Executive Producer Erica Messer and stars Joe Mantegna (David Rossi), Aisha Tyler (Dr. Tara Lewis) and Zach Gilford (Elias Voit) sit down with IGN to talk about the new season of Criminal Minds: Evolution. The team delves into the long legacy of the show, which has already been renewed for a 19th season, what it's like when the show's stars turn to directing episodes, such as the recent "The Zookeeper" and "Time to Say Goodbye," the key to playing not just a killer, but a killer with amnesia, and much more! Plus, what would happen if Fat Tony, Lana Kane, and Matt Saracen joined the Criminal Minds team!?

Presented by FX’s Alien: Earth. Premieres August 12th on FX and Hulu.

#IGN #IGNLive2025
title: Criminal Minds: Evolution Stars Tease the Show’s Scary New ‘Network’ That’s Just Waking Up

author: IGN
description:
It’s been well over two decades since we had a Wu-Tang Clan video game, but the upcoming action-RPG Wu-Tang: Rise of the Deceiver has us covered. The developers from Brass Lion Entertainment join us at IGN Live to talk about how it’s celebrating hip-hop, the legacy of the Wu-Tang Clan, and bringing gameplay and sound design together alongside the legendary producer Just Blaze. Protect ya necks and fight your way to save the Method Man, RZA, O.D.B. and the rest of the Wu-Tang Clan in shaolin style when the game launches sometime in the future.

IGN's Summer of Gaming is presented by Nintendo Switch 2. All Together, Anytime, Anywhere.
title: Wu-Tang Clan is Back in the New Action-RPG Wu-Tang: Rise of the Deceiver | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
Guardians of the Wild Sky is a survival-crafting adventure where magical creatures called Guardians are your greatest allies. Soar through the skies by building your fully customized airship to explore the massive world where players will discover floating biomes filled with unique creatures to tame, hidden treasures, and terrifying beasts to take down.
Head over to Steam and add Guardians of the Wild Sky to your wishlist.
title: Guardians of the Wild Sky - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
You can play as Minecraft Steve in Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds!
IGN's Summer of Gaming is presented by @lenovolegion #IGNSummerofGaming

#IGN
title: Audience Reaction to Minecraft Steve in Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds at #SummerGameFest

author: IGN
description:
It's our 900th episode! And we're at IGN Live! So, in honor of this momentous occasion, we invented a whole game show: Wheel of PS4-tune! Why? Because it was a good title. So, all the questions are about Sony's last console generation, its hardware, games, and so on. How well do Brian and Jada know deep-cut PlayStation 4-centric trivia? How are they at guessing video games based on their ESRB descriptions? Do they remember the whole launch lineup? How good are they at anagrams? Who can throw a teeshirt further? It's a big loud stupid birthday party episode, and I'm writing this before we actually shoot the dang thing so who knows how it'll go, so apologies in advance if it goes even further off the rails than we anticipated.

#IGN #IGNLive2025 #PS5
title: Let's Play The Ultimate PlayStation 4 Game Show, Wheel of PS4-tune! - Beyond 900

author: IGN
description:
Get to know up and coming queer Creator, Lovell Holder (Producer of The Surrender), co-writer and director of the new play-to-film adaptation, Lavender Men. Lavender Men centers a stage manager's play and life, as they daydream on set, reimagining Abraham Lincoln's life but with a gay storyline. 
In our interview, Lovell breaks down the unique film and how it came to be, talks about the importance of queer characters and representation in film, convinces IGN's Lindsey Salzer to get into the horror genre with The Surrender, tells us why Sarah Michelle Gellar is the ground he walks on, and so much more.

Lavender Men is available in select theaters across the US now, and is available to stream on June 17, 2025.

Photo credit: Luke Fontana

#IGN #IGNLive2025
title: Looking Into the Future of Queer Cinema & Celebrating Pride: Lovell Holder Interview (Lavender Men)

author: IGN
description:
A developer presentation for Deathground dug into the deadly dinosaurs players will be running from in Jaw Drop Games’ upcoming cooperative thriller. It’s coming to Steam Early Access in Q3 2025, so keep an eye out for ‘roar’ news in the near future.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Deathground - Official Developer Overview Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Killing Floor 3 is the latest installment in the iconic action horror FPS franchise, where you join the rebel group Nightfall to fight for the future of humanity. It’s 2091, and megacorp Horzine has produced the ultimate army: an obedient horde of bioengineered monsters called zeds.

After getting tons of feedback from the beta, Killing Floor 3’s Creative Director, Bryan Wynia, joins IGN's Alan Knight at IGN Live to chat about what the team has been working on, the design and musical inspirations for the game, and gives a tease for what post-launch content will look like.

Presented by Killing Floor 3.
title: Killing Floor 3 - Developer Diary | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out the gameplay trailer for Ground Zero, a survival horror game set in post-apocalyptic Korea where you must fight to survive against an onslaught of mutated monsters. Ground Zero will be available on PC via Steam.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Ground Zero - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the reveal trailer for Echoes of the End, an upcoming high fantasy brawler from Myrkur Games and Deep Silver. This narrative-driven third-person adventure is headed to PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X/S in 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Echoes of the End - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description: Check out a new psychological horror game by Blumhouse Games called Sleep Awake. Created by Spec Ops: The Line's Cory Davis and Nine Inch Nail's Robin Finck, Sleep Awake is set in an unknown city where its denizens are disappearing in their sleep. Those left must stave away from sleep, avoid death cults, and fend off otherworldly forces that threaten their lives. Sleep Awake will be released on Xbox, PC, and PlayStation 5 in 2026.
title: Sleep Awake - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Creator Chris Sheridan and star Alan Tudyk (Harry Vanderspeigle) beamed into IGN Live this weekend to talk about Season 4 of their Syfy/USA Network series Resident Alien. Tudyk -- who directed the first two episodes of the season -- and Sheridan talk about the changes the character Harry has undergone... including becoming "human" and losing his powers. The series' star also charts the history of his many robot voice roles from over the years, but does he have a favorite?

IGN's Summer of Gaming is presented by MindsEye. Pre-Order Now.
title: How Many Voices Does Alan Tudyk Have? | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
Crisol: Theater of Idols is a first-person horror/action game set in Hispania, a twisted version of Spain. Play as Gabriel, a soldier who uses blood as both weapon and lifeline. Explore the cursed island of Tormentosa, uncover dark secrets, and battle horrifying enemies. Will you survive? Crisol is developed by Vermila Studios and published by Blumhouse Games. 

Crisol: Theater of Idols is coming to PC, PS5, and Xbox later this year.
title: Crisol: Theater of Idols - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the MindsEye launch trailer for this upcoming narrative-driven action-adventure thriller game from developer Build A Rocket Boy. Set in the near-futuristic city of Redrock, step into the shoes of Jacob Diaz, a former soldier haunted by fragmented memories from his mysterious MindsEye neural implant, as he uncovers a conspiracy involving rogue AI, corporate greed, an unchecked military, and a threat so sinister that it endangers the very survival of humanity. MindsEye will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X/S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store) on June 10, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming #IGNLive2025
title: MindsEye - Official Launch Trailer | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
Join some of Critical Role’s founding cast members (Travis Willingham, Matthew Mercer, Marisha Ray, Laura Bailey, Liam O’Brien, and Taliesin Jaffe) for a look back at a decade of Critical Role at IGN Live. From a home tabletop roleplaying game to sold-out arenas, hit animated series, record-setting charity streams, game publishing, and more, hear their favorite behind-the-screen moments, the choices that reshaped Exandria and beyond, and how a single stream became a global community. Where will the next decade take them?

IGN's Summer of Gaming is presented by FX’s Alien: Earth. Premieres August 12th on FX and Hulu.
title: Critical Role: The 10th Anniversary Panel | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Reveal Trailer for Blind Descent, a sci-fi survival first-person game developed by Pokuch. Players will explore the surface of Mars after a catastrophic mission failure, permitting the entrance to an alien ecosystem. Search for missing crew members, observe alien behavior, and craft tools to aid on the journey. Blind Descent is coming soon to PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, and GoG).

#BlindDescent #Gaming #IGN
title: Blind Descent - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The cast of Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, Ben Starr (Verso), Kirsty Rider (Lune), Rich Keeble (Monoco), Shala Nix (Sciel), Maxence Corsola (Esquie), and Jennifer English (Maelle) join IGN Live for a panel to discuss making the game behind the scenes, their performance capture work, reactions to some of our favorite scenes, and everything in between.


#IGN #Gaming #IGNLive2025
title: Cast of Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 React To Iconic Moments From The Game | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
Andy (Charlize Theron) and her team of immortal warriors are back, with a renewed sense of purpose in their mission to protect the world. With Booker (Matthias Schoenaerts) still in exile after his betrayal, and Quynh (Veronica Ngô) out for revenge after escaping her underwater prison, Andy grapples with her newfound mortality as a mysterious threat emerges that could jeopardize everything she’s worked towards for thousands of years. 

Andy, Nile (KiKi Layne), Joe (Marwan Kenzari), Nicky (Luca Marinelli) and James Copley (Chiwetel Ejiofor) enlist the help of Tuah (Henry Golding), an old friend who may provide the key to unlocking the mystery behind immortal existence. Directed by Victoria Mahoney, and also starring Uma Thurman, The Old Guard 2 is an emotional, adrenaline-pumping sequel, based on the world created by Greg Rucka and illustrator Leandro Fernandez.

The Old Guard 2 premieres globally on Netflix Wednesday, July 2, 2025.

#IGN #IGNLive2025
title: The Old Guard 2 - Exclusive Clip | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
Subscribe to IGN for more!
http://www.youtube.com/user/IGNentertainment?sub_confirmation=1

#IGN
title: The Old Guard 2 Clip #IGNLive

author: IGN
description: "It is binding. It is not forgiving. To betray one is to betray all." Watch Enzo’s initiation to the Torrisi Family in this full-length scene from Mafia: The Old Country. Mafia: The Old Country launches August 8, 2025 for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC via Steam.
title: Mafia: The Old Country - Official 'The Initiation' Story Trailer

author: IGN
description: Take a look at Directive 8020, a new survival horror game by Until Dawn developers Supermassive Games. In this new trailer, which shows the last vestige of humanity's spaceship crash landing on a mysterious planet, Supermassive Games revealed the game's Turning Point mechanic, a feature that allows players to rewind the clock and make different choices to keep their sequestered space navigators alive. Directive 8020 releases on PC, PlayStation, and Xbox on October 2, 2025.
title: Directive 8020 - Official Trust No-One Trailer

author: IGN
description:
M3GAN 2.0 writer/director Gerard Johnstone took the stage at IGN Live to share an exclusive clip from the sequel and talk about how to turn a villain into a hero. He also confirmed a longstanding theory about M3GAN's distinctive voice and its relationship to another famous killer robot.

M3GAN 2.0 comes to theaters June 27.

IGN's Summer of Gaming is presented by PlayStation Days of Play. Get the PlayStation 5 Digital console with the Call of Duty Black Ops 6 bundle. Starting at $399.99. While supplies last.
title: How M3GAN 2.0 Got a Terminator 2 Inspired Upgrade | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out this tense Criminal Minds: Evolution clip from the drama series. Criminal Minds: Evolution stars Joe Mantegna, Aisha Tyler, Zach Gilford, Erica Messer, and more. The new season of Criminal Minds: Evolution is now streaming on Paramount+.

#IGN #IGNLive2025
title: Criminal Minds - Official Clip (2025) Joe Mantegna, Aisha Tyler, Zach Gilford | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
Critical Role's co-founder and game master himself, Matthew Mercer, takes the stage at IGN Live to show off his new TTRPG Daggerheart, which adds things like hope & fear and card mechanics to the fantasy tabletop experience. Plus, with the help of a fan, Mercer pushes live a custom card generator that'll let Daggerheart players create homebrew elements to make games all their own. Daggerheart is available in physical and digital editions at retailers now.

IGN's Summer of Gaming is presented by MindsEye. Pre-Order Now.

#IGN #IGNLive2025
title: Daggerheart’s Matthew Mercer Walks Us Through His TTRPG’s Custom Card Generator | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
It's never a bad time to return to The Walking Dead: A Taletale Games Series or play it for the first time, and this trailer aims to show why. Play the original, 400 Days, Michonne, Season Two, The Final Season, and A New Frontier now on PC and Consoles.

#IGN #TheWalkingDead #Gaming
title: The Walking Dead: A Telltale Games Series - Gameplay Trailer | Green Games Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
The world of Avatar: The Last Airbender comes alive in Avatar: Realms Collide, a game now available on iOS and Android that is an immersive 4X strategy game that features an original story developed in collaboration with Avatar Studios. Play with fan-favorite characters, build your city, fight in epic battles, and more.

#IGN #AvatarWorld #Gaming
title: Avatar Legends: Realms Collide - Official Gameplay Trailer | Green Games Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Squid Game creator/director/writer Hwang Dong-hyuk and actors Lee Jung-jae, Lee Byung-hun, Park Sung-hoon, and Kang Ae-sim join us at IGN Live to debut an exclusive clip from Season 3, featuring a distraught Gi-hun coming to grips with the failed rebellion which brought Season 2 to a close. They also tease how Gi-hun and Front Man represent the series' evolving themes, how critical it is for each episode to end perfectly, what memories they'll carry with them after the show ends, and the single word that sums up the series finale.

Squid Game's third and final season premieres on Netflix on June 27th.

IGN's Summer of Gaming is Presented by FX’s Alien: Earth. Premieres August 12th on FX and Hulu.
title: Squid Game’s Cast and Creator on The Importance of Ending “Just The Right Way”  | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
Head of Sonic Team Takashi Iizuka joins us at IGN Live to talk all about the upcoming kart racer Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds, continuing the legacy of Sonic racing games. This time, you’ll be traveling through whimsical worlds in the middle of races while you fiercely compete against friends and foes playing as your favorite characters across the Sonic series. But wait, there’s more – there will be a ton of guest characters like Kasuga Ichiban from Like A Dragon, Hatsune Miku, Joker from Persona 5, and..Steve from Minecraft? The crossovers are wild, and Iizuka-san shares what you can expect when Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds launches on September 25, 2025.

IGN's Summer of Gaming is presented by PlayStation Days of Play. Get the PlayStation 5 Digital console with the Call of Duty Black Ops 6 bundle. Starting at $399.99. While supplies last.
title: Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds Is The Big Crossover Kart Racer You Need to Play | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
Based on the Dark Horse comics, Resident Alien follows a crash-landed alien named Harry and his life on planet Earth. The fourth season starts with Harry and his baby Bridget stuck in prison on the Grey Moonbase, while a shape-shifting Alien called a Mantid has taken over his body on Earth passing himself off as the real Harry Vanderspeigle. 

Harry manages to escape the Greys and arrives back on Earth for a showdown with the Mantid Alien but soon finds he may not have what he needs to finish the job. Asta and D’arcy struggle to keep a secret from Ben and Kate, who are both desperate to find answers to what has been happening to them. Sheriff Mike and Deputy Liv attempt to solve some mysterious deaths in Patience that Sheriff Mike is beginning to think aren’t caused by anything human.

The series stars Alan Tudyk, Sara Tomko, Alice Wetterlund, Corey Reynolds, Elizabeth Bowen, Levi Fiehler, Meredith Garretson and Judah Prehn. Alan Tudyk makes his television directorial debut helming th
title: Resident Alien: Season 4, Episode 2 Exclusive Clip - IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description: A brand new gameplay trailer for The Seven Deadly Sins: Origin aired during the Future Games Show Summer Showcase. It’s an open-world Action RPG based on the fan-favourite anime, The Seven Deadly Sins, and it’s coming soon to PC and PS5. You can pre register now at 7origin.netmarble.com.
title: The Seven Deadly Sins: Origin - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Subscribe to IGN for more!
http://www.youtube.com/user/IGNentertainment?sub_confirmation=1

#IGN
title: Our hosts REALLY love having Nintendo Switch 2 systems in the office. Presented by @NintendoAmerica

author: IGN
description:
Rick and Morty Season 8 is airing now, so voice stars Ian Cardoni (Rick) and Harry Belden (Morty) crashed their spaceship into IGN Live to chat about the new run of episodes. What happens when Morty acts cool (or tries to)? How have the fans taken to the new voice actors now that they've inhabited these roles for a season and a half? What really, really, really weird things happen this season? And what did they think of A Minecraft Movie? We've got all that and more in this exclusive chat!


IGN's Summer of Gaming is presented by PlayStation Days of Play. Get the PlayStation 5 Digital console with the Call of Duty Black Ops 6 bundle. Starting at $399.99. While supplies last.

#IGN #IGNLive2025
title: Rick and Morty Reveal Their Favorite Video Games | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Announcement Trailer for The Expanse: Osiris Reborn, an upcoming sci-fi action RPG developed by Owlcat Games. Players will be taken on an original story as a member of Pinkwater Security mercenary at the wrong place at the wrong time. Make strategic decisions that influence the bonds between yourself and fellow squadmates, engage in real-time strategic cover mechanics using various abilities and squad coordination, all while being immersed while traveling to iconic locations from the TV show and books. The Expanse: Osiris Reborn is coming soon to PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, and GoG).

#IGN #Gaming
title: The Expanse: Osiris Reborn - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
To open up IGN Live 2025, the cast of Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 joins host Mark Medina and talk about why Clair Obscur stands out as one of the biggest games of the year and why they think it deserves to be Game of the Year, all while in their iconic Baguette costumes from in-game! 

IGN's Summer of Gaming is presented by Nintendo Switch 2. All Together, Anytime, Anywhere.

#IGN #Gaming #IGNLive2025
title: The Cast of Clair Obscur: Expedition 33: Why the Game Deserves GOTY | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
The murderous doll who captivated pop culture in 2023 is back. And this time she’s not alone. The original creative team behind that phenomenon—led by horror titans James Wan for Atomic Monster, Jason Blum for Blumhouse and director Gerard Johnstone—reboot an all-new wild chapter in A.I. mayhem with M3GAN 2.0. 

Two years after M3GAN, a marvel of artificial intelligence, went rogue and embarked on a murderous (and impeccably choreographed) rampage and was subsequently destroyed, M3GAN’s creator Gemma (Allison Williams) has become a high-profile author and advocate for government oversight of A.I. Meanwhile, Gemma’s niece Cady (Violet McGraw), now 14, has become a teenager, rebelling against Gemma’s overprotective rules. Unbeknownst to them, the underlying tech for M3GAN has been stolen and misused by a powerful defense contractor to create a military-grade weapon known as Amelia (Ivanna Sakhno; Ahsoka, Pacific Rim: Uprising), the ultimate killer infiltration spy. 

But as Amelia’s sel
title: M3GAN 2.0 - Exclusive Clip | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
Much like how Alien Isolation was a love letter to the first Alien movie, Alien: Rogue Incursion is a love letter to its sequel, Aliens. Find out how in this interview with TQ Jefferson and Eugene Elkin of Survios as they talk about Alien: Rogue Incursion Part 1 Evolved Edition

Presented by Lenovo Legion. Reach Your Impossible.
title: Alien: Rogue Incursion Part One Evolved Edition is a Love Letter to Aliens | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
Escape room meets co-op survival horror in Whisper Mountain Outbreak. The year is 1998 and an ancient curse has been unleashed, trapping everyone on Mount Bisik. Alone or with up to 4 players, you must explore, find clues, figure out a way to escape...and survive the horror.

Whisper Mountain Outbreak will be released on PC August 11, 2025. Play the demo and wishlist it on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1953230/Whisper_Mountain_Outbreak/

#IGN #Gaming
title: Whisper Mountain Outbreak - Release Date Trailer | Southeast Asian Games Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Lay waste and achieve world dominance in the huge kaiju fighting game GigaBash! Live out your best life as an enormous mech and batter your enemies in satisfying, fully destructible cityscapes. Play solo or with up to 4 players in multiple modes: arcade, battle, onslaught, and more.

Play GigaBash now on Switch, PlayStation, Xbox, and PC.

#IGN #Gaming
title: GigaBash - Official DLC Announcement Gameplay Trailer | Southeast Asian Games Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description: Defeat enemies and reap their souls! Well, after you've completed the trials. Grim Trials is a slick, roguelike dungeon crawler with crafting elements. You will act as Avelin, a lighthearted girl who wishes to become a grim reaper, in order to see her still-living loved one again.
title: Grim Trials - Official Announcement Trailer | Southeast Asian Games Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Chill with your friends in Weyrdlets' summer update: Fishing & Friends! Explore the brand-new Cozy Cove where you and your pals can fish and kick back with your pets. Weyrdlets is a wholesome idle pet game that will keep you company as you work on your desktop.

Play Weyrdlets on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2366060/Weyrdlets__Idle_Desktop_Pets/

#IGN #Gaming
title: Weyrdlets - Official Multiplayer Gameplay DLC Trailer | Southeast Asian Games Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Hack-and-slash your way through Burning Sword: Death Sun, a martial arts game with satisfyingly fluid combat. Dive into a tale of revenge, redemption, and intense swordplay – and avenge your murdered family.

Burning Sword: Death Sun will enter Early Access later this year. Wishlist it on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2561460/Burning_Sword_Death_Sun/

#IGN #Gaming
title: Burning Sword: Death Sun - Official Demo Gameplay Trailer | Southeast Asian Games Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Losing in a game is frustrating enough when it’s your fault, but even worse when your controller betrays you. At IGN Live 2025, we got hands-on with SCUF’s Envision Pro, featuring cutting-edge anti-drift technology to keep your gameplay precise. Senior Product Manager Ali Homayounfar walked us through its high-performance design, programmable paddles, and how it elevates competitive play in fast-paced titles like Call of Duty. Whether you're a pro or just demand reliability, see why the Envision Pro stands out.

Presented by Lenovo Legion. Reach Your Impossible.
title: Hands-On with SCUF Envision Pro | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
Gamers, rejoice! Or, maybe we should be saying "run for your lives!" Universal Halloween Horror Nights is gearing up to drop fans into the worlds of not one, but two hit video game adaptations during their upcoming 2025 season: Amazon Prime Video's Fallout and Universal's Five Nights at Freddy's. John Murdy and Matthew Flood, from Universal Studios Hollywood and Orlando respectively, join us to tease what elements of the Fallout series (including power armor and Pip-Boys) to look out for, how the plot of the first season influenced the maze, plus which legendary creature shop will be behind the killer animatronics of the Five Nights at Freddy's attraction.

Universal Halloween Horror Nights begins on September 4th at both Universal Studios Hollywood and Universal Studios Orlando.
title: Fallout & Five Nights At Freddy's: First Details on Halloween Horror Nights Attractions | IGN Live

author: IGN
description: You are the only game tester for a fictional AI called A.I.L.A. Can you tell what is real and what is a game in this first-person horror game coming to Steam, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series consoles.
title: A.I.L.A. - Official Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description: Rescue your cursed sister with only the weapons you can create in this survival horror sequel. Explore haunting places when Tormented Souls II comes to PS5, Xbox Series consoles, the Epic Games Store, GOG, and Steam. Try the Steam demo now.
title: Tormented Souls 2 - Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase 2025

#IGN
title: How to Train Your Dragon Scene Comparison #IGNLive

author: IGN
description:
Picking up from Season 2’s devastating cliffhanger, Season 3 thrusts Gi-hun (Player 456) back into the brutal heart of the games, determined to dismantle them once and for all. Still haunted by the betrayal and loss of his closest ally, Jung-bae (Player 390), Gi-hun faces new perils — including the Front Man, who shockingly infiltrated their rebellion disguised as Player 001. 

Familiar faces return: The Front Man, detective Hwang Jun-ho, and players Myung-gi (Player 333), Dae-ho (Player 388), Hyun-ju (Player 120), Yong-sik (Player 007), Geum-ja (Player 149), Jun-hee (Player 222), Min-su (Player 125), Nam-gyu (Player 124), and the pink guard No-eul. 

Get ready for the premiere of Squid Game Season 3 on June 27, exclusively on Netflix.

#IGN #IGNLive2025
title: Squid Game - Season 3 Exclusive Clip (Lee Jung-jae, Greg Chun) | IGN Live 2025

Subscribe to IGN for more!
http://www.youtube.com/user/IGNentertainment?sub_confirmation=1

#IGN

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at gameplay and more from R-Type Delta: HD Boosted in this latest trailer for the upcoming game in the side-scrolling shoot-'em-up series. R-Type Delta: HD Boosted will be available on Steam, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5 (PS5), PlayStation 4 (PS4), and Xbox Series X/S in 2025.

#IGN #Gaming #IGNLive2025
title: R-Type Delta: HD Boosted - Official Trailer | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at Adventure of Samsara in this announcement trailer for the upcoming game. The Adventure of Samsara trailer shows gameplay, enemies you'll fight, and more. Adventure of Samsara will be available on Xbox, GOG, Steam, Nintendo Switch, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and PS4 (PlayStation 4).

#IGN #Gaming #IGNLive2025
title: Adventure of Samsara - Official Announcement Trailer | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
Get another look at gameplay and more from Cloudheim in this latest trailer for the upcoming cooperative action RPG blending crafting with chaotic physics-based combat for 1-4 players. Gather your allies, craft your weapons, and upgrade your shop in the sky to bring harmony to a broken realm. Cloudheim will be available on Xbox Series X/S, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and PC (Epic Games Store and Steam) in 2025. Sign up for open beta is available now.

#IGN #Gaming #IGNLive2025
title: Cloudheim - Official Open Beta Trailer | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out the fun Ledgerbound trailer for this upcoming narrative tactical RPG comedy from ex-Helldivers 2 developers. Learn more about the story as you play as the world’s top strategist: an insurance adjuster gunning for a promotion. But when an ancient immortal enemy threatens life as you know it (and worse, your shot at a promotion!), you must leave your desk behind and strike out to save the world. Ledgerbound will be available on Steam.

#IGN #Gaming #IGNLive2025
title: Ledgerbound - Official Trailer | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out gameplay and learn about the story of Wander Stars in this trailer for the upcoming anime turn-based RPG. Unleash custom attacks by combining words in Wander Stars. Collect all 200 words, earn Pep Ups from honorable victories, and become a Kiai master. Befriend your rivals, uncover dark mysteries, and seek out the pieces of the Wanderstar map in a wild race across the universe. Wander Stars will be available on PC (Steam) and Nintendo Switch. A demo is out now on Steam.

#IGN #Gaming #IGNLive2025
title: Wander Stars - Official Overview Trailer | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out action-packed gameplay from Shinobi: Art of Vengeance in this video for the upcoming 2D action platformer game. The iconic Shinobi returns in this game, featuring a unique hand-drawn look created by the team behind the hit brawler Streets of Rage 4. Shinobi: Art of Vengeance will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), PlayStation 4 (PS4), Nintendo Switch, Xbox, and PC (Steam) on August 29, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming #IGNLive2025
title: Shinobi: Art of Vengeance - Official Gameplay | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
Run! The adorable cats are here. Check out this cute yet horrifying Nyaight of the Living Cat clip from the anime series. In 20XX, the world is dominated by cats. A virus which turns anyone who touches a cat into a cat has spread into a worldwide nyandemic. Cats rub against people, turning them into cats. Can humanity fight their urge to pet cats to survive in this cat-ridden world?

#IGN #IGNLive2025 #Anime
title: Nyaight of the Living Cat - Official Clip | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
Five years after the events of Jurassic World Dominion, the planet’s ecology has proven largely inhospitable to dinosaurs. Those remaining exist in isolated equatorial environments with climates resembling the one in which they once thrived. The three most colossal creatures across land, sea, and air within that tropical biosphere hold, in their DNA, the key to a drug that will bring miraculous life-saving benefits to humankind.

Anchored by iconic action superstar Scarlett Johansson, Emmy and SAG nominee Jonathan Bailey and two-time Oscar winner Mahershala Ali, this action-packed new chapter sees an extraction team race to the most dangerous place on Earth, an island research facility for the original Jurassic Park, inhabited by the worst of the worst that were left behind. 

Also starring acclaimed international stars Rupert Friend and Manuel Garcia-Rulfo, the film is directed by dynamic visualist Gareth Edwards (Rogue One: A Star Wars Story) from a script by original Jurassic Park
title: Jurassic World Rebirth - Exclusive Clip | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
The new Marvel streaming series stars Dominique Thorne as Riri Williams, a young, genius inventor whose iron suits rival the best in the MCU. The character made her debut in 2022’s Black Panther: Wakanda Forever, directed by Ryan Coogler.

Set after the events of Black Panther: Wakanda Forever, Ironheart pits technology against magic when Riri—determined to make her mark on the world—returns to her hometown of Chicago. Her unique take on building iron suits is brilliant, but in pursuit of her ambitions, she finds herself wrapped up with the mysterious yet charming Parker Robbins aka “The Hood” (Anthony Ramos).

The series also stars Lyric Ross, Alden Ehrenreich, Regan Aliyah, Manny Montana, Matthew Elam and Anji White. Chinaka Hodge is head writer; episodes are directed by Sam Bailey and Angela Barnes. Executive producers include Kevin Feige, Louis D’Esposito, Brad Winderbaum, Zoie Nagelhout, Chinaka Hodge, Ryan Coogler, Sev Ohanian and Zinzi Coogler. Music is by Dara Taylor. Produced
title: Ironheart Season 1 - Exclusive Clip (2025) Dominique Thorne | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
Join lead level designer Eugenia Pavlenko at TomorrowHead Studio for a deep dive into WILL: Follow The Light in this latest video for the first-person adventure puzzle game. Learn about your mission, the story, and world, and get a behind-the-scenes look at the creation of WILL: Follow The Light. In WILL: Follow The Light, dive into a realistic, single-player, first-person journey through the harsh northern latitudes as you sail endless waters, searching for a way back to your loved ones. Will you follow the light? WILL: Follow The Light will be available on PC (via Steam), Xbox Series X/S, and PS5 (PlayStation 5).

#IGN #Gaming
title: WILL: Follow the Light - Official Developer Deep Dive Video | Women-Led Games x SGF 2025

author: IGN
description:
Reach a summit never climbed before in this survival-climber from the creators of Furi and Haven. Climb anywhere and plan your route carefully, managing pitons and resources to survive unforgiving Mount Kami. Discover what Aava is willing to sacrifice to achieve the ascent of a lifetime.
Cairn will be available on PlayStation 5 and PC. Visit Steam to add the game to your wishlist and download the demo!

#IGN #Gaming
title: Cairn - Official Developer Overview Trailer - Women-Led Games x SGF 2025

author: IGN
description:
Get a fresh look at Void Martyrs in this new gameplay trailer for the upcoming grimdark survival horror about a nun in a space suit. The new Void Martyrs trailer shows gameplay, the terrifying creatures you'll encounter, and the game's creepy world. In Void Martyrs, scavenge amongst drifting space cathedrals, balance your faith with survival, and craft the tools of your salvation. Void Martyrs will be available on PC via Steam.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Void Martyrs - Official Gameplay Trailer | Women-Led Games x SGF 2025

author: IGN
description:
Woodo feels like a 3D coloring book you can touch, a relaxing tale told through handcrafted wooden dioramas. No pressure, just a cozy world that remembers what it felt like to be a child.
Woodo will be available on Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch, and PC. Visit Steam to add the game to your wishlist.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Woodo - Official Trailer | Women-Led Games x SGF 2025

author: IGN
description:
Join the solo developer at Glass Head Dolls for a deep dive into the world of Prison of Husks and what you can expect from this upcoming game. Prison of Husks is a nostalgic, single-player souls-like set in a bittersweet, melancholic world inspired by the interconnected level design of earlier souls games. Awaken as a doll and seek your beloved. Explore a painted afterlife full of secrets and adversaries. A demo for Prison of Husks is available now on Steam.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Prison of Husks - Official Demo Trailer | Women-Led Games x SGF 2025

author: IGN
description:
Crash-land into this exclusive short clip from Rick and Morty Season 8, Episode 3. Join Rick (voiced by Ian Cardoni) and Morty (Harry Belden) as they kill time in space before coming across a particular point of interest... The 8th season of Rick and Morty airs Sundays on Adult Swim.

#IGN #IGNLive2025
title: Rick and Morty - Exclusive Season 8 Clip (2025) Ian Cardoni, Harry Belden | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
Get a behind-the-scenes look at the making of Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 in an upcoming documentary about the turn-based RPG from developer Sandfall Interactive. In this sneak peek clip, join the developers on the day before launch, and go behind the scenes of the motion capture performances, including how the emotional opening scene between the characters Gustave and Sophie was brought to life, and a fun moment between Monoco and Verso.

Please note this documentary is a work in progress and the full video may change.

Lead the members of Expedition 33 on their quest to destroy the Paintress so that she can never paint death again. Explore a world of wonders inspired by Belle Époque France and battle unique enemies in Clair Obscur: Expedition 33. 

Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 is available now on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X/S, and PC.

#IGN #Gaming #IGNLive2025
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 - Exclusive First Look at The Making of Documentary | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
LEGO Party! is a cross-platform party game for up to four players that's built different! Coming 2025 to PC, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, PS5, PS4, and Nintendo Switch. 
Compete against your friends in wacky Challenge Zones and 60 hilarious minigames from across your favorite LEGO sets like Pirates, Space, NINJAGO and more. Join your friends online no matter their platform, for a LEGO Party game night.
title: LEGO Party! - Official Reveal Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2025

author: IGN
description: Simulate what it's like to be a games developer in Let's Build a Dungeon. Make an MMO, build the quests, negotiate contracts, manage server storage, work/life balance, and much more. The Just Build mode is a cozy co-op version where you can team up with others to build your dream game. Wishlist on Xbox and Steam now.
title: Let's Build a Dungeon - Official 'Just Build' Mode Trailer | Wholesome Direct 2025

author: IGN
description: Something has happened to the moon, meteors now shower the surface world, and Shell's mother has gone missing. Explore the underground as a platforming cat. Meet bizarre characters and discover secrets in the deep. Play the demo now on Steam and check out the full game on July 10th.
title: Everdeep Aurora - Official Release Date Trailer | Wholesome Direct 2025

author: IGN
description: Create your own home within the Shire. Forage, make friends, and eat lots of food. Embrace the life of a hobbit on July 29. Wishlist now on Steam.
title: Tales of the Shire: A The Lord of the Rings Game - Official Trailer | Wholesome Direct 2025

author: IGN
description:
Get a peek at the story and check out action-packed gameplay in this trailer for Project Evil Bane from Netmarble. Registration for the Pre-Alpha Test is available now.

#IGN #Gaming #IGNLive2025
title: Project Evil Bane - Official Trailer | IGN Live 2025

title: Things go DIFFERENTLY in this Game of Thrones game #ignsummerofgaming #summergamefest

author: IGN
description:
Dying Light: The Beast expands on the series' zombie-slashing melee action with the addition of guns and Hulk-like super strength, producing some admirably textured combat encounters. 

When I left my appointment with Techland at gamescom last year, I was somewhat skeptical as to how guns in Dying Light would affect the core ideas. But having had the opportunity to play myself, in which I had the agency to choose when and where guns were deployed, I quickly learned that firearms are just one component of Dying Light: The Beast, not the main attraction. Each combat scenario felt like a problem with a dozen solutions, rather than the melee mosh pits that I typically found myself in while playing Dying Light 2. 

Are you excited about Dying Light: The Beast?
title: Dying Light: The Beast – The First Preview - IGN First

author: IGN
description: IGN’s Summer of Gaming is presented by @mindseyegame
title: Crowd goes WILD for Resident Evil 9 reveal

author: IGN
description:
Resident Evil 9 revealed (as Resident Evil Requiem), updates on Dying Light: The Beast, Death Stranding 2 and more. Here's a partial list of highlights: 

-Resident Evil 9 / Resident Evil Requiem
-Lies of P: Overture Is Available Today

-Wu-Tang: Rise of the Deceiver
-Onimusha: Way of the Sword

-Hitman World of Assassination Elusive Target
-Mortal Shell 2
-Killer Inn

title: Summer Game Fest 2025: Everything Announced

author: IGN
description:
Blade & Soul Heroes is a collectible action MMORPG, which takes place 3 years before the events of the original Blade & Soul series. It’s a story-driven game offering dual combat types -- real-time and turn-based -- plus a creative mix-and-max team dynamic. The collectible component encourages players to seek out different heroes and build teams optimally suited to counter each boss’s distinct attack patterns.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Blade & Soul Heroes - Official Reveal Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out this Ball x Pit announcement trailer for the upcoming fantasy roguelite game where heroes must find the balls to plunge deeper into a seemingly bottomless pit of monsters. In Ball x Pit, develop arcane ammunition and resources in pursuit of treasure, recruiting additional heroes to aid you in your perilous quest. Ball x Pit will be available on PC (Steam), Nintendo Switch, and Xbox Series X/S in 2025. A demo for Ball x Pit is out now on Steam.

Ballbylon has fallen. After a meteoric and completely unexpected event annihilated the great city, all that remains is an ominous, yawning pit. Treasure hunters from far and wide flock to the city’s tomb to seek their fortune, plumbing the depths in search of Ballbylon’s scattered riches. Few return. 

The pit plays host to armies of barbaric creatures, hellbent on ending your quest before it even begins. Armed with a growing arsenal of magic-infused projectiles, batter your way through multiple levels of increasingly challenging obst
title: Ball x Pit - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Dive into the gorgeous animation and swift gameplay of Possessor(s). Explore a quarantined city ripped apart by an interdimensional catastrophe in this side-scroller – and defend yourself in challenging precision combat.

Possessor(s) is coming to PC and consoles in 2025. Wishlist it on Steam today: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2132890/Possessors/
title: Possessor(s) - Official Gameplay Trailer | Day of the Devs: Summer Game Fest Edition

author: IGN
description:
Reviewer Travis Northup revisits Hogwarts Legacy on the Switch 2 to see how it compares to the original Switch and the PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X, and PC versions.

#IGN #Gaming #NintendoSwitch2
title: Hogwarts Legacy Switch 2 Review Update

author: IGN
description:
Watch the release date trailer for Mecha BREAK, the PvP mech assault game from Amazing Seasun Games. In the aftermath of the Catastrophe, a mysterious carbon-silicon mineral known as Corite has breathed new life into Earth's depleted energy industry. But its gift came with a curse — its pathogenic nature and uncontrollable spread are slowly devouring the last habitable spaces on the planet. Within 30 years, the heavily polluted Marcens Zones threaten to engulf the entire globe, pushing humanity to the brink of extinction. Mecha BREAK is coming to PC and Xbox Series X|S on July 1, 2025.

#MechaBreak #Gaming #IGN
title: Mecha BREAK - Official Release Date Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Find your rhythm in the fast-paced roguelike action game Ratatan. Jump into intense, music-driven melee battles – moving to the beat will help you succeed in this delightful, colorful, and heartfelt adventure.

Ratatan will be released in 2025 on PC and consoles. Wishlist it on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2949320/Ratatan/

#Ratatan #Gaming #IGN
title: Ratatan - Official Gameplay Trailer | Day of the Devs: Summer Game Fest Edition
